# sage-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                                          | Type                    | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- | ----------- |
| `componentId` | `component-id` | A unique identifier for this input. Associates the input with its label                              | `string`                | `undefined` |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | Disables input control                                                                               | `boolean`               | `false`     |
| `label`       | `label`        | Text to be displayed as the switch label                                                             | `string`                | `undefined` |
| `name`        | `name`         | Used for identifying form data. Unifies a group of radio inputs for toggling a single property/value | `string`                | `undefined` |
| `type`        | `type`         | Specifies the underlying input type                                                                  | `"checkbox" \| "radio"` | `undefined` |
